title: Attenuation of photosynthesis in nanosilver-treated Arabidopsis thaliana is inherently linked to the particulate nature of silver
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Vincent Mays, Natalie Smith, Cody Pham, Margaret White, Qihua Wu, Jacob Berry, Alexander Linan, D. Alexander Wait, Laszlo Kovacs
